description.narrative: The objective of the project is to reduce electricity losses, improve the reliability of power supply and increase the population's access to electricity in Kumasi.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
